briefdescription.para: Action for editing the application customization (visible when Ctrl + F8 is pressed)
Construct with pointer to /p parent object and /p title.
Load application configuration from variant map.

parameterdescription.para: Variant map representation of the application configuration

briefdescription.para: Save application configuration to variant maps.

simplesect.para: Variant representation of the application configuration

briefdescription.para: Signals that the may configure state has changed to /p mayConfigure.
Check whether the application configuration may be edited.

simplesect.para: True if the application configuration may be edited, false otherwise

detaileddescription.para: Note: This action is developed for internal use only
